title: Strengthening Strategic Management Competencies: Holistic Science Education for Achieving Sustainability

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental science knowledge and general understanding of sustainability
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can explain scientific concepts related to sustainability by connecting them to social contexts.
Learners can propose solutions to local environmental issues based on critical thinking and moral reflection.

Learners participate in a 2-week service-learning activity (community sustainability project) to share at least three practical experiences and submit two reflective journals incorporating reflective questions (what, so what, now what).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
